FEOC_AUDIT_RIGHTS_MISSING.plain_english: The agreement lacks audit or inspection rights to verify FEOC compliance.
FEOC_AUDIT_RIGHTS_MISSING.user_action_hint: Add audit rights, document retention, and subcontractor flow-downs.
FEOC_AUDIT_RIGHTS_MISSING.why_it_matters: You may be unable to prove compliance during diligence or substantiation.

FEOC_CHANGE_OF_CONTROL_SILENT.plain_english: The contract does not address FEOC exposure created by future ownership changes.
FEOC_CHANGE_OF_CONTROL_SILENT.user_action_hint: Add notice, consent, and termination rights tied to FEOC exposure.
FEOC_CHANGE_OF_CONTROL_SILENT.why_it_matters: A compliant deal can become noncompliant overnight after an acquisition.

FEOC_CURABLE_BREACH.plain_english: FEOC violations are treated as minor or easily curable.
FEOC_CURABLE_BREACH.user_action_hint: Make FEOC exposure a material breach with fast or no-cure treatment.
FEOC_CURABLE_BREACH.why_it_matters: Some FEOC issues require immediate remediation to preserve eligibility.

FEOC_ENTITY_STATUS.plain_english: A party or relevant affiliate may qualify as a Foreign Entity of Concern or is not clearly excluded from being one.
FEOC_ENTITY_STATUS.user_action_hint: Add explicit non-FEOC representations covering affiliates and control, plus ongoing compliance certifications.
FEOC_ENTITY_STATUS.why_it_matters: FEOC involvement can disqualify tax credits and block financing or credit transfers.

FEOC_INDEMNITY_EXCLUDED.plain_english: The agreement limits or excludes indemnification for FEOC-related losses.
FEOC_INDEMNITY_EXCLUDED.user_action_hint: Add targeted FEOC indemnities and carve-outs from liability caps.
FEOC_INDEMNITY_EXCLUDED.why_it_matters: Credit denial or recapture can result in significant unrecoverable losses.

FEOC_MATERIAL_ASSISTANCE.plain_english: The contract allows or does not restrict material assistance from a Foreign Entity of Concern.
FEOC_MATERIAL_ASSISTANCE.user_action_hint: Prohibit FEOC material assistance and require sourcing disclosures and certifications.
FEOC_MATERIAL_ASSISTANCE.why_it_matters: Material assistance from an FEOC can independently disqualify eligibility.

FEOC_OM_PROVIDER.plain_english: Operations or maintenance services may be performed by an FEOC-linked provider or subcontractor.
FEOC_OM_PROVIDER.user_action_hint: Restrict FEOC-linked providers and require approval and substitution rights.
FEOC_OM_PROVIDER.why_it_matters: Service-provider FEOC exposure is difficult to unwind after closing.

FEOC_REPRESENTATION_MISSING.plain_english: The contract lacks clear representations regarding FEOC status.
FEOC_REPRESENTATION_MISSING.user_action_hint: Add reps covering FEOC status, affiliates, control, and sourcing.
FEOC_REPRESENTATION_MISSING.why_it_matters: Without reps, you lack enforceable compliance assurances.

FEOC_SUPPLY_CHAIN_CONTENT.plain_english: Supply chain inputs may include FEOC-linked components or services.
FEOC_SUPPLY_CHAIN_CONTENT.user_action_hint: Require FEOC-free sourcing commitments and upstream disclosure obligations.
FEOC_SUPPLY_CHAIN_CONTENT.why_it_matters: Supply chain sourcing is a common failure point in eligibility diligence.

FEOC_TERMINATION_MISSING.plain_english: The contract lacks termination or exit rights for FEOC exposure.
FEOC_TERMINATION_MISSING.user_action_hint: Add termination and transition rights triggered by FEOC exposure.
FEOC_TERMINATION_MISSING.why_it_matters: You may be locked into a noncompliant arrangement.

CREDIT_AT_RISK.plain_english: This issue creates a meaningful risk to credit eligibility.
CREDIT_AT_RISK.user_action_hint: Tighten sourcing controls and require supporting certifications.
CREDIT_AT_RISK.why_it_matters: Diligence or substantiation may fail without remediation.

CREDIT_DISQUALIFICATION.plain_english: This issue can disqualify the project from the relevant tax credit.
CREDIT_DISQUALIFICATION.user_action_hint: Treat as a hard stop. Remove FEOC involvement and escalate immediately.
CREDIT_DISQUALIFICATION.why_it_matters: Eligibility may be denied or credits may be subject to recapture.

ECONOMIC_LOSS.plain_english: FEOC exposure may result in unrecoverable financial losses.
ECONOMIC_LOSS.why_it_matters: Weak allocation of risk magnifies downside.

FALSE_COMPLIANCE.plain_english: The contract appears compliant but allows FEOC workarounds.
FALSE_COMPLIANCE.user_action_hint: Make FEOC exposure a material, fast-action breach.

FUTURE_EXPOSURE.plain_english: FEOC risk may arise later due to changes in control or vendors.
FUTURE_EXPOSURE.why_it_matters: Future changes can silently break eligibility.

LOCKED_IN_RISK.plain_english: You may be stuck in a noncompliant arrangement.
LOCKED_IN_RISK.why_it_matters: Delayed exits can destroy eligibility timelines.

PROOF_FAILURE.plain_english: You may be unable to prove FEOC compliance.
PROOF_FAILURE.user_action_hint: Add audit rights and document access obligations.
PROOF_FAILURE.why_it_matters: Inability to prove compliance can block transactions.

REMEDY_GAP.plain_english: The contract lacks enforceable FEOC remedies.
REMEDY_GAP.user_action_hint: Add reps, covenants, termination, and indemnities.
REMEDY_GAP.why_it_matters: You may be unable to fix or exit noncompliance.

STRUCTURAL_RISK.plain_english: The project structure embeds potential FEOC exposure.
STRUCTURAL_RISK.user_action_hint: Restrict FEOC-linked parties and add substitution rights.
STRUCTURAL_RISK.why_it_matters: Structural exposure is difficult to unwind post-closing.

notes: Pure UI/output copy layer. No logic.
Referenced by concept_id and by consequence output_class at render time only.
Safe to edit copy without affecting analysis.
